name: Moo.F.O
description:
Play as an alien collecting samples of earth lifeforms while an exceptionally angry farmer tries to blow your ship out of the sky. Dodge missiles while collecting various livestock to achieve a complete DNA replica of each animal, kiting around hazards and trying desperately to avoid incoming fire.

This project was created by collab group 25 for the Collaberative Games Module at Staffordshire University, the list of both senior/junior members that worked on the project are as follows.

Seniors
Luke Oxer - Tech
Marco Moro - Tech
Sam Rowan - Design
Emma Geary - Art
Tommy Evans - Art
Matthew Hadfield - Art
Mark Newell - Animation

Juniors

Owen Chen - Design
Glen Knapp - Design
Lauren Percival - Art
